page.title: 08SKELMORLIE P.S. ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are many different activities in school, especially for pupils of P4 upwards.The boys play football,P7 boys play rugby,girls play netball,all pup- ils play badminton.Matches are arrang- ed with other schools in these sports. There is a school chess club which also plays matches. The school choir competes in the Greenock Festival with some success and sometimes competes in the Ayrshire Schools Festival. The school has a BBC Computer for class use.As well as using commercial programmes P6 have made graphics and also put music on to the computer. We also go on theatre visits or to a concert. The expeditions can be out- doors and we have had a ski weekend at Glenshee. We produce our own plays or concerts involving all pupils or just one class
